column4: I've got a java program with an icon, but Unity seems to scale the icon or something, and it ends up blurry. Doesn't matter if I make the icon 32x32, 48x48, or 128x128. The guys at ##java sent me here.
have you tried using an svg icon?
the icon is svg, but unfortunately Java doesn't support svg, so I have to convert it into a rasterized image at some point.
you should better ask in a ubuntu development channel, e.g. #ayatana.
